publications.name: Rethinking Memory in AI: Taxonomy, Operations, Topics, and Future Directions
publications.summary: A comprehensive survey on memory in AI systems, including taxonomy, key operations, emerging topics, and future research challenges.

publications.name: Bridging the Long-Term Gap: A Memory-Active Policy for Multi-Session Task-Oriented Dialogue
publications.summary: Proposes a novel memory-active policy for long-term memory modeling in task-oriented dialogue systems.

publications.name: TWiNS: An Implicit Noise Suppression Approach for Multi-Turn Dialogue Fine-Tuning
publications.summary: Introduces a turn-weighted fine-tuning strategy to suppress noise in multi-turn dialogue data.

publications.name: PerLTQA: A Personal Long-Term Memory Dataset for Memory Classification, Retrieval, and Fusion in Question Answering
publications.summary: Presents a benchmark dataset focused on long-term memory utilization in QA settings. Best Paper Award.

publications.name: A New Formula for Sticker Retrieval: Reply with Stickers in Multi-Modal and Multi-Session Conversation
publications.summary: Proposes a new method for sticker-based responses in multi-modal conversations. Co-first author.

references.name: Prof. Kam-Fai Wong

projects.name: Human-like Memory Integration for Dialogue System

projects.name: Multi-modal Summarization System
projects.summary: Designed and implemented a system combining audio, image, and text using LLMs for better summarization.

projects.name: Dialogue Memory Patent (Huawei)
